action.name: Set text
action.param: "C'est au tour du joueur 2 de courrir." & newline & "Appuyer sur start pour continuer."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "C'est au tour du joueur 1 de courrir." & newline & "Appuyer sur start pour continuer."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Scroll X : " & scrollx & " - Scroll Y : " & scrolly & " - Mouse X : " & Mouse.AbsoluteX & " - Mouse Y : " & Mouse.AbsoluteY & " - X : " & WindowWidth-Mouse.AbsoluteX & " - Y : " & WindowHeight-Mouse.AbsoluteY

action.name: Set text
action.param: "W-Height : " & WindowHeight & " - W-Width : " & WindowWidth & " - Scroll X : " & scrollx & " - Scroll Y : " & scrolly & " - Mouse X : " & Mouse.AbsoluteX & " - Mouse Y : " & Mouse.AbsoluteY & " - WW-MX : " & WindowWidth-Mouse.AbsoluteX & " - WW-MY : " & WindowHeight-Mouse.AbsoluteY

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Top : " & round(ViewportTop(0)) & " - Left : " & round(ViewportLeft(0)) & " - Right : " & round(ViewportRight(0)) & " - Bottom : " & round(ViewportBottom(0))

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Acceleration : " & P1_Collider.Platform.Acceleration & " - MaxSpeed : " & P1_Collider.Platform.MaxSpeed & " - Deceleration : " & P1_Collider.Platform.Deceleration & " - Gravity : " & P1_Collider.Platform.Gravity & " - Speed : " & P1_Collider.Platform.Speed
